verses.roman: bhaktye mukti pāileha avaśya kṛṣṇere bhajaya

synonyms: bhaktye—by devotional service; mukti—liberation; pāileha—if one gets; avaśya—certainly; kṛṣṇere—unto Lord Kṛṣṇa; bhajaya—renders service.
translation: "When one is actually liberated by executing devotional service, he always engages in the transcendental loving service of the Lord.
